channel.title: Comments on: How to name groups of tiles in Windows 8
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLArcher
item.dc:creator: SQLArcher
item.description: A quicker way to minimize is to use CTRL + Scroll wheel.
item.content:encoded: A quicker way to minimize is to use CTRL + Scroll wheel.

item.title: By: Marlon Ribunal
item.dc:creator: Marlon Ribunal
item.description: Windows 8 looks really nice! I can't wait for my ThinkPad! I'll load Win8 once it becomes available!
item.content:encoded: Windows 8 looks really nice! I can’t wait for my ThinkPad! I’ll load Win8 once it becomes available!
